name: PLATAFORM LAND
description:
WARNING: there is a bug that wont let you control your character until you click on him, i dont know what is this, but im working on it

PLATAFORM LAND

An 2D open wolrd game where you jump from plataform to plataform!

you can jump onto the red plataforms, which are normal, or take a spin in the yellow plataforms! or if you are lazy like me, you can even take an taxi plataform  like the green one!

the creatures that live in this place wont hurt you, instead they will copy your movements.

if you touch the edge of the wolrd, you will warp to the other side!
